title: Is karma real or an abstract concept? - Quora

response.answer_text: Karma is the concept that if you do good, you receive good. Which in many cases can be true. But Karma is transferred between lives. (which is non-sens). I all comes down to belief, it's basically a religious thing. There is no yes or no answer.But i believe,whenever you do something bad, you will see it on yourself and if you do something good, something better will happen to you.
